body.p: In May 2019 the Board published the Exposure Draft Interest Rate Benchmark Reform (2019 Exposure Draft), which proposed exceptions to specific hedge accounting requirements in IFRS 9 and IAS 39 to provide relief in the period before the reform of interest rate benchmarks. The Board issued the final amendments to IFRS 9 and IAS 39 in September 2019. Paragraphs BC6.546–BC6.603 of the Basis for Conclusions on IFRS 9 and paragraphs BC223–BC288 of the Basis for Conclusions on IAS 39 provide the background to these amendments.
